hero.title: Hi, I'm Yanina Unrein

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Hi, I'm Yanina Unrein
descriptions: Fullstack Developer with a Frontend focus and one and a half years of experience. Specialized in designing, developing, and optimizing web applications, with the ability to contribute to larger fullstack projects. Experienced in agile methodologies and collaborative work.
I am a proactive, committed, and self-taught professional, always seeking to give my best in every project. I am passionate about programming and developing innovative solutions.

In July 2024, I graduated as a Web Development and Digital Applications Technician from Instituto Superior Politécnico Córdoba. I am currently studying a Web Development degree at the University of Entre Ríos, in my second year, and continuously learning through courses, bootcamps, or self-taught methods.
about.cvText: If you are interested in learning more about my professional experience and academic background, you can download my Curriculum Vitae below:

technologies.title: Technologies
descriptions: My main area of expertise is Frontend development, but my training is FullStack.

HTML, CSS, JS, creating small and medium web applications with Angular or React, custom plugins, functions, animations, and interactive design coding. I also have experience as a developer with CMS platforms such as WordPress, Shopify, CPanel, and Wix.
